# fontColor

**Instance Property**

The color of the label.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var fontColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

```swift

```

```swift

```

## Discussion

The default color is white.

## Specifying a Label’s Font

- **fontName**: The font used for the text in the label.
- **fontSize**: The size of the font used in the label.
